## Natural history notes

The Fragile Forktail (Ischnura posita) is a small species of damselfly, reaching a maximum length of about 1.14 inches. It is widely distributed across the eastern United States, from Maine and Wisconsin south to Texas and Florida. This species can be recognized by the distinctive green mark on its shoulder, which resembles an exclamation point.
